channel.title: [PI] Dueling
channel.description:
Hello people,
I have a problem: Whenever you kill your opponent, he will go to the right coords. The winner doesn't, nothing happens to him. But when he logs out it's counted as a loss and the actual loser will get the staked items... How would I fix this?

item.title: [PI] Dueling
item.dc:creator: @Rickrolla Rickrolla
item.description:
@Rickrolla wrote:

Hello people,

I have a problem: Whenever you kill your opponent, he will go to the right coords.
The winner doesn’t, nothing happens to him.
But when he logs out it’s counted as a loss and the actual loser will get the staked items…
How would I fix this?

Read full topic
